TopicTitle: Airplane, 45 fueltanks, pretty controllable imho, pics below

Articles.Content:
This is it:

Not that easy to take off with it.

just wait till the end of the runway and give a good press on the S key, quickly activate the advsas and gain some height.

just needs some trys for practice and then itÃ‚Â´s all good.

The Pictures are from my just finished flight to the northpole. It took me about 45 minutes and i used 27 1/2 fueltanks.
